description: How to Flake Out on Plans If You're Depressed
extended: When I was growing up, there was nothing better than when school was canceled for a snow day. It didn’t just mean no school; it was bigger than that. Snow was the universe’s way of saying, “Shhh, no more human ac­tivities, no cars, hush now, earth, settle down.

description: The Antiwar Activist Who Helped Make Donald Trump Possible - Bloomberg Politics
extended: In late January, Donald Trump held one of his final rallies before the Iowa caucuses at the Dubuque airport. On the tarmac, with loudspeakers blasting the theme from the Harrison Ford movie Air Force One, a crowd of shivering supporters roared when Trump’s Boeing 757 made a flyby.
